Package com.gerard.site.controller.tag

package com.gerard.site.controller.tag
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    DefineLanguageAttributesTag
    Custom JSP-tag, defines and sets in the app locale and bundle due to this locale .
    OutputSiteDescriptionTag
    Custom JSP-tag to display information from description XML file that must be located at application root level and must corresponds requirements of using custom tool for XML parsing SingleDocDomParser SingleDocDomParser .
    SingleDocDomParser
    XML parsing tool that works only with files, that realized next requirements: Only root element has child elements Root element have unique child elements Root child elements have unique names .
